languages.text: "От пламени очага... разлетелись искры. Имя искры сей... Авель... Ханейманн".
"The fire of the hearth... sent forth sparks. The name... of this spark is... Abel... Haneumann."
languages.original_text: "От пламени очага... разлетелись искры. Имя искры сей... Авель... Ханейманн".

traits.locale_text: "The fire of the hearth... sent forth sparks. The name... of this spark... is Abel... Haneumann."
"The fire of the hearth... sent forth sparks. The name... of this spark... is Abel... Haneumann."

languages.text: "Das Feuer des Herds ... hat Funken gespien. Der Name ... dieses Funkens lautet ... Abel ... Haneumann."
languages.original_text: "The fire of the hearth... sent forth sparks. The name... of this spark is... Abel... Haneumann."

traits.locale_text: "Das Feuer des Herds ... hat Funken gespien. Der Name ... dieses Funkens lautet ... Abel ... Haneumann."

languages.text: « Le feu de l'âtre... a envoyé des étincelles. Moi, étincelle... je me nomme... Abel... Haneumann. »
languages.original_text: "The fire of the hearth... sent forth sparks. The name... of this spark is... Abel... Haneumann."

traits.locale_text: « Le feu de l'âtre... a envoyé des étincelles. Moi, étincelle... je me nomme... Abel... Haneumann. »

languages.text: “炉火……溅射出火花。这个火光……的名字是……亚伯……哈努曼。”
languages.original_text: "The fire of the hearth... sent forth sparks. The name... of this spark is... Abel... Haneumann."

traits.locale_text: “炉火……溅射出火花。这个火光……的名字是……亚伯……哈努曼。”

languages.text: 「炉床の火が…火花を放つ。この火花の…名前は…アベル…ヘニュマン」
languages.original_text: "The fire of the hearth... sent forth sparks. The name... of this spark is... Abel... Haneumann."

traits.locale_text: 「炉床の火が…火花を放つ。この火花の…名前は…アベル…ヘニュマン」

languages.text: «El fuego del hogar... echaba chispas. El nombre... de esta chispa es... Abel... Haneumann».
languages.original_text: "The fire of the hearth... sent forth sparks. The name... of this spark is... Abel... Haneumann."

traits.locale_text: «El fuego del hogar... echaba chispas. El nombre... de esta chispa es... Abel... Haneumann».

languages.text: "Ocağın ateşinden... Kıvılcımlar doğdu. Bu kıvılcımın adı da... Abel... Haneumann."
languages.original_text: "The fire of the hearth... sent forth sparks. The name... of this spark is... Abel... Haneumann."

traits.locale_text: "Ocağın ateşinden... Doğdu kıvılcımlar. Bu kıvılcımın adı da... Abel... Haneumann."
